name: 3DCARP2
description:
A Carp fishing simulator / game for the modern angler.
Fish in 8 lakes and 8 rivers using a huge choice of tackle and bait.
Catch Carp, Catfish, Sturgeon, Barbel, Indian Mahseer and Tench.
Create your own rigs and make your own bait.
Use a spod rod / marker rod / catapult / throwing stick / bait boat (equipped with sonar).
Fish in spring, summer, autumn or winter and choose between day or night.

3DCARP2 – the most advanced Carp fishing game.
